alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 13 at 2:36PM MDT until August 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following area, San Rafael Swell. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in debris flows on area burn scars and flash flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes, slickrock areas, streams, urban areas, and low-lying flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
